name: FRIDAY PRAYER the 1st
description:
A sequel to my personal 2020 work entitled "ANGSTY LONE PRAYER".
This work is actually intended as artwork for my own merchandise (@st.elsel > st= saint) which consists of 3 parts (characters) (1) Regular Prayer (2) Old Man in Red (3) Satan Himself.

25.11.21
After brainstorming with NFT artists and participating in several SPACEs, I feel that the end of 2021 is the right time to revive this work, because I feel something good about them (the prayers) and deserves more appreciation (i guess). I dunno, my friend.. i just feel happy about them to fill this kinda metaverse and stuff. :)

schedule: mint on friday, burn on next thursday

Anyway.. Enjoy the pray.
TGIF. Assalamualaikum.
XOXO
